entity.description: Acompanhe abaixo os principais Tweets sobre o programa:

entity.name: Big Brother Brasil
entity.description:
Acompanhe as novidades da 20ª edição do BBB, confira as reações do pessoal ao programa de hoje e fique por dentro das movimentações e estratégias rolando dentro desta 'nave louca'. Será que seu brother/sister preferido irá vencer o prêmio de R$ 1,5 milhão? 

Foto via @BBB

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @allisonpearson I think it's fairly clear that life won't return exactly how it was prior to #covid19.   Perhaps more working from home, less international travel, temperature checks on public transport, health apps etc.  It's here now so we have to learn to live with it until there's a vaccine.
